name: Banzai (RetroGamer)
description:
The best way to recover your spirits and vitality: A good meal. Collect all the food throughout the levels, every time you eat, you will improve your jump. 

Made by RetroGamer for No Code Jam

Right-Left Arrow keys | Horizontal Movement

Spacebar | Jump 

Prototype made without programming, with Game Maker, dragging action blocks to assemble the logic behind the objects of each scenario.
